content.text:
In the EPF Processing Port Enabled state, the controller is performing Emergency Power Fail Processing,
as described in section 8.2.5.3. The port is enabled.
Transitions out of this state are defined in Figure 726.

tables.title: Table_8_2_5_1_7_EPF_Processing_Port_Enabled_State
tables.table_md:
| State Transitions | | Transition Condition | | :--- | :--- | :--- | | **Starting** | **Ending** | | | EPF Processing Port Enabled | EPF Complete Port Enabled | • The controller completes EPF processing. | | | PLS Not Ready | • The controller processes a Controller Level Reset; or
• CSTS.SHST is not cleared to 00b. |
